relic_shard.name: A Shard of Truth
relic_shard.description: Find a Relic Shard in the Temple Ruins.
accept_lines: We need proof the ruins have re-opened.
Bring back a Relic Shard from the Temple Ruins and we'll pay you for the risk.
turn_in_lines: A Relic Shard... the markings are real.
Good work. This will help the Archivist decode the murals.

reach_floor_3.name: Deeper Echoes
reach_floor_3.description: Reach Floor 3 of the Temple Ruins.
accept_lines: The surface chambers are picked clean.
Go deeper—reach Floor 3—and report what you find.
turn_in_lines: So the tremors continue even at Floor 3...
Here. You'll need supplies if you're going back down.

bounty_raiders.name: Bounty: Ruins Raiders
bounty_raiders.description: Thin out raiders preying on explorers.
accept_lines: We have a bounty posted by local traders.
Defeat 3 Ruins Raiders in the Temple Ruins.
turn_in_lines: That's 3 raiders less to worry about.
Keep your eyes open. The ruins attract the wrong kind of people.

rescue_satchel.name: Rescue: Lost Satchel
rescue_satchel.description: Recover a satchel from a missing explorer.
accept_lines: A junior explorer went missing near the ruins.
If you find their satchel, bring it back. Their family is worried.
turn_in_lines: We'll notify the family. You did what you could.

escort_scout.name: Escort: Guide the Scout
escort_scout.description: Guide a scout deeper into the Jungle Cavern.
accept_lines: A scout is mapping new passages outside of town.
Enter the Jungle Cavern and reach Floor 2.
turn_in_lines: Good. The scout's notes will help the next team.
Here's your pay. Keep moving forward.

bounty_guardians.name: Bounty: Stone Guardians
bounty_guardians.description: Clear dangerous guardians near deeper chambers.
accept_lines: The deeper chambers have awakened something heavy.
turn_in_lines: Two down. The path is safer for now.
